passage_text: Mediators with 20 years or more on the job earn average salaries between $88,437 and $122,084 and those with less than a year as a mediator can earn an average salary between $27,000 and $45,000.

Mediator Salaries. The median annual salary for a mediator is estimated at $55,800 a year, according to AllCriminalJusticeSchools.com, an online directory of criminal justice careers. “U.S. News and World Report,” on the other hand, estimates the median at $66,800 a year.

Georgia Mediator Salary Information. The average yearly salary for Mediator in Georgia is $52,529. If you are just beginning to work a new job as a Mediator in Georgia, you could earn a starting pay rate of $43,259 annually.

Geographic location is one factor in the salary a mediator may earn. The cost of living varies from state to state, which causes differences in the average salary. For example, California mediators earn salaries between $52,080 and $122,084 while those in Florida earn between $36,625 and $90,757.

Mediator Salary. Mediator average salary is $69,234, median salary is $31,970 with a salary range from $25,000 to $208,000. Mediator salaries are collected from government agencies and companies. Each salary is associated with a real job position. Mediator salary statistics is not exclusive and is for reference only.
